website_summaries.verdict: Travels with you so you can read comfortably on a whim.
pros: Light in weight, making it easy to move from one spot to the next
Customers appreciate the sturdiness of this chair, noting it eases back pain
Ideal for long nights of studying or a relaxing read in the park
cons: Some customers note there may be an odor to the foam  when the chair is removed from its packaging

website_summaries.verdict: Good multipurpose floor chair you can use in a variety of activities.
pros: Simple design that gives you many different uses
Beyond gaming, it can be used for activities such as meditation and watching TV
cons: Not as comfortable as other dedicated gaming chairs

customer_reviews.title: Back supports snapped in half, I’m only 150 lbs.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see my chair broke within 2 weeks of use. All I used it for was to use my computer because it’s set up on a coffee table for now. I’m only 150 lbs and the back supports gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these chairs, and at first, I loved them. However, they are not durable and will not stand the test of time. The metal in the frame scratched my floors pretty badly, one of them completely fell apart, and after a few months, I just got rid of both of these.
customer_reviews.author: NicciJemz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks great too!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable for meditation and reading! Great purchase and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The construction bars can be felt through the seat bottom after about 45 minutes of sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivvy

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, storable, extra casual seating!
customer_reviews.text: For the price its an awesome little item to bust out when some more casual seating is needed. Folds flat so it can be tossed behind a couch or anywhere and can adjust for multiple reline angles. Seems like decent quality as i am 6’2” and over 200 lbs, and it can support me no prob, but clearly some care needs to be taken overtime as its pretty light weight. Again for the price, and convenience though, it exceeds my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: ryan c.

customer_reviews.title: The chair worked fine at first
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair so we could sit on the floor with our baby daughter. The chair arrived with the package ripped and in pieces, though the chair seemed ok. The chair worked fine at first, however after a while the back of the chair seemed to start giving us problems and kept collapsing, and then a few months after we bought the chair, I heard a "pop" and a part of the seat of the chair seemed to have broken. I am unable to return the chair since the return window has passed. I would not recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: cnote702

customer_reviews.title: Great for meditation practice
customer_reviews.text: I'm 67 with spinal arthritis, and I meditate every day. I decided that if I were to continue my practice that I would need something for a little bit of back support. This bonVIVO Easy II takes the agony out of sitting. I place my cushion on top of it, and it works just perfectly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Steven A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Cheap frame
customer_reviews.text: Only had this chair for a few weeks and it broke. The frame completely snapped. Would not recommend this chair for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: McCormick's

customer_reviews.title: It's study enough
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable. It did have a chemical smell when I first opened it. It still has a slight smell in the deep padding but it's slowly working its way out. I've owned it for about five days. I left it in my car in the heat to help remove the smell faster and it worked. I'm obese at 275lbs (125kg) and it feels sturdy enough. At first I was confused as to how to open it after closing it, but closing it all the way allowed me to reopen it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: doesnt look like you payed over $40 at all
customer_reviews.text: As compare to the price , it does not have the quality at all. It has strong synthetic smell that lasted over weeks, and the fabric is very cheap both by looking and using. The fabric picks up every little thing on the carpet and it is washed off greyish blue color, doesnt look like you payed over $40 at all. Disappointed. Dont recommend it .
customer_reviews.author: Utuq

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the Easy III, but Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased an Easy III from bonVIVO which is great for sitting and working or eating (I have a low table), but it only had one position for the backrest: up. Thus I ordered the Easy II which features the adjustable angle backrest. The chair itself is a little narrower, meaning I won't be able to sit with legs crossed on it doing my work (I have the Easy III for that), but it is still wide enough for me to sit comfortably on with my legs outstretched while I recline back a bit. Overall a great floor chair for watching TV or playing video games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a foldable chair to use it in my tent and found the perfect one! It's comfi and compact. A great product!
customer_reviews.author: SSB

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money, Frame Breaks
customer_reviews.text: The frame on this broke within two months and I used it as intended. Use: just sitting on the floor with my laptop and the adjustment frame just wouldn't click and hold place anymore. I wish I had spent a little more and gotten a more quality chair that wouldn't break within only two months. I'm only hoping I can get a refund for money/time wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Im thin. Recovery from cancer will make you thin. And this broke on me. Im maybe 120 lbs right now and needed support for floor . Dealing with bruised back now and wasted $. I unziped after it broke , its new, but inside was all just a mess. A loose zipper was fkoating around a riped material protection for the foam you sit on. I like it. Wish it was more R&D on how its made. Maybe a hand pistin system. Wouldn't buy or trust weight limit. They are as far as j know not facfiry testex by anyone so be werned you can get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Kojima

customer_reviews.title: Great for apartments and other small spaces
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our toddler's room and love it. It's comfortable enough for nighttime snuggles and fun all day long for him. He's enjoyed pretending he's in a house while he sits behind it. It seems pretty high quality and looks beautiful. Plus it folds down flat and easily stores under the crib or in the closet. We'll be ordering another soon for his room and one for the living room. (covered in pillows in the photo)
customer_reviews.author: UnaDHB

customer_reviews.title: Supportive and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got a couple of these to have in my chiropractic office- when we host meetings some people like to sit on the floor with their kids and these provide the support they need. The chairs themselves are very soft and look inviting. The quality is nice and they are comfortable. I feel more supported with the chair in an upright position- it has some give when it is slightly extended but I still feel like it will hold me. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, lasted less than half a year.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a lifesaver. Unfortunately after a few months of use, the setting I use all the time seems to sag or slip back, which does not allow me to sit as straight as I'd like. Edit: After 5 months of use, the back supports failed. I opened it up and found the metal tubing on one side had bent, the other actually folded into a creased corner. It turns out the sagging/slipping I was experiencing was a material failure, not the hinges slipping. I'm a 160 lb male, so I don't think this should have failed. My recommendation: Don't bother with this chair, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Duy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little chair
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid chair. I love the fact that you can adjust the recline easily. It’s very comfy. I prefer this over my couch due to it preventing me from slouching. Most couches I’ve used caused me to slouch and bend my lower back uncomfortably. It’s hard to sit with bad posture in this chair. If I could buy a couch that provided the same comforts as this chair, I’d be all over it. No regrets at all with this purchase. It has performed flawlessly for months. I am 5’7” and 165 lbs and this chair fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the floor but better for your back
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the metal in the base and leaning back is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Simplystyle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sleek, flexible
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable, sleek, flexible chair that can be used by children and adults alike. It is nicely padded without being bulky, and it is really easy to move from one place to another. The adjustable back moves smoothly and easily. Great for gaming or just watching TV. Definitely pleased with this purchase and considering purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: recommended floor chair
customer_reviews.text: Comfy chair, great colors, easy to use recline positioner, high back support. Slight factory smell after being removed from plastic packaging but went away after less than 24 hrs. Definitely recommend for adults and children alike.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: A sturdy comfortable chair for yoga training, but .....
customer_reviews.text: A sturdy comfortable chair for yoga training, but ..... the headrest and cover was stitched on crooked. It doesn't affect the comfort of the chair, it just looks like someone was tired, or looking at it sideways when they sewed the headrest on.
customer_reviews.author: P.E. for all

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work on art projects while sitting on the floor for long periods of time. This does the job nicely! I have even started using it as an alternative to the couch while watching TV. This chair is also way warmer to sit in than I anticipated, which was a nice surprise as I usually have a blanket anyway. I didn't find that I had any issues with stability when leaning back, but have mainly used this in the 'upright' position. This chair also looks nice in the living room. I have not noticed any lingering chemical smell, though there was a little just when I first got it and unwrapped it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: I recently switched to sleeping on the floor and that sort of got me into the whole eastern style of room arranging. I now have a floor desk and coffee table and was looking for something that would accommodate those two. The seat is very light and surprisingly durable; I'm two hundred pounds and it handles my full weight when I lean back with no problem. When I'm not using it, I just snap it into its open position and slide it between my bookshelves. It's very simple and very affordable. I wouldn't bother looking anywhere else for a floor chair.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect with a few modifications
customer_reviews.text: I use this for meditation. Since I'm not a young as I used to be, I required a meditation pillow under me for better support, but having a back rest does allow me to meditate longer without any physical discomforts. The most forward position isn't quite as erect as I'd like, but works perfectly with an extra back pillow behind me as well. Excellent quality and durability. If you need a back rest on the floor, this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Lite, sturdy, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great. I’m 9m pregnant, I have a 2yr old & I’m still constantly getting up & down off the floor to play with her. I found I kept trying to sit in places on the floor where I could lean (most of the time uncomfortably) up against something. This chair is so lite that I can easily bring it from room to room & up & down the stairs. It also feels sturdy, so I don’t feel like I’m going to break it. I also love that it has different settings, so I can adjust how upright I’m sitting for my own comfort. My 2yr old loves it as well. :)
customer_reviews.author: MHoisi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have a small room and a foldable desk which I use while I sit on my bed. But doing that would always make my back hurt, I discovered these styles of chairs and decided to buy one and see. This is amazing because I can sit on my bed comfortably and not hurt my back. I also have fibromyalgia which when I sit on my bed without support, causes more pain than just someone without fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No More Arched Back
customer_reviews.text: This chair has really improved my experience while sitting on the floor at my laptop. It is sturdy, it is comfortable, it is exactly like a chair but without legs. Pros: - Strong, doesn't squeak or give when I lean back - Comfortable, no soreness on the bottom or restless shifting - Easy to clean, I use a hand held vacuum on the lower suction setting - Easy to fold up and put away when you want Cons: - Not the toughest material. Accidentally scrapped it with my nail and their is a scratch mark that won't go away
customer_reviews.author: Hammi Mama

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality chair
customer_reviews.text: I love their concept and design however the quality of the product is poor. I can literally feel all the metal structures under the cushion, I'm only 132 lb. Also when every time I lay back I hear a squeaking noise from the joint since the first day of receiving the item. This made me feel the product is a used item sold as new, or returned from previously buyer and sent to me without inspection. Using 1-2 hours everyday for two weeks makes my butt and back hurts so bad. If you are a male and planning to use this for longer time than I do, please consider other options.
customer_reviews.author: Haejoo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this chair is to set up and put away. It's very comfortable and offers great support. My only minor issue is that if you use it a lot, the bottom cushioning does wear in after several months, but I still use it and a small pillow or cushion can always be set on top of the bottom cushion and it's perfectly usable and comfortable. I especially love how easy it is to store it after use, that way it doesn't take up a lot of space if you live in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: These things have really held up well. I have them in a classroom with 100 8th graders.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not great for leaning back, thin seat cushion
customer_reviews.text: Got this for gaming. Color feels high-end but suede material is clingy - pet owners beware! Mechanism seemed to hold up, but chair is thin and felt flimsy at times. Worry it would break if you lean back or with a heavier person. Biggest complaint was seat pad was thin and uncomfortable after a few hours. Also bc the back is so rigid and leaning back feels dangerous, you definitely need a lumbar support pillow. Ended up returning for a similar chair with more supportive cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. D

customer_reviews.title: Not kid-proof
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I was worried at first about weight limits and whether it could be comfortable for a heavier adult to sit on the floor with. It is. However, I actually bought this for my kids to sit on for family movie time...and they had so much fun adjusting the back levels and then collapsing it...over and over and over again...that they broke easily within a week. Also, because of their faux-suede material covering, they are dog hair magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Collins

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my daughter and son to use while playing video games/using tablets/watching tv and my daughter (13) brags about how comfy and stylish it is. She says the colors are elegant and she has been sitting in it since I unboxed it earlier today. My son (3) is happy to have his own gaming chair to sit on while playing with his iPad and enjoys lying the chair all the way down to relax. The price was good one and the quality for the price matches. I'm glad I found them and the kids are as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Buttons not centered properly, but a nice chair
customer_reviews.text: If I was going to have this out in view, I would have returned it because one of the two buttons is way off center of where it should have been sewn on, but because this isn't going to be seen, it wasn't worth the hassle to package it and ship it back. My point is to carefully check it before keeping it. It is comfortable, it adjusts nicely, and works well for longer meditations (on lazy days!)
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted, but will add lumbar cushion
customer_reviews.text: I just received this, so can't really discuss durability or cleanability. I am about 130 pounds. I use a floor back jack to meditate. But when I lean back, it lifts enough off the floor to lean too far back for me. I want to remain upright. This chair does exactly that. It is almost 90 degrees and keeps me upright. I will need to get or make a lumbar cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Convenient
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was hoping for when it came to having floor seating I could move around easily. I find myself often sitting with my folding coffee table but the lack of back support was putting a strain on me. The sturdiness of this chair when it's locked in is perfect. It's easy to adjust by pulling it forward then moving back. I don't feel like it's gonna snap on me or anything (weight 170). It's easy to slide behind furniture or in the closet when it's not in use. Also there is just enough cushion. I have a sensitive tail bone from an injury and it doesn't irritate it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this chair. It's comfy, stylish, easy to clean and the adjustment positions are fantastic. I was looking for a chair that would accompany my new Japanese Tea Table. I decided to work while sitting on the floor and this chair is the perfect match for the table. Highly recommend this chair.
customer_reviews.author: dustinowilliams

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My dad was in the military and I grew up in Japan for about 8 years of my life and I remember using chairs similar to this. Coming back to the states, all there really is to compare to this is a cushion for the floor with no back support. I was very happy to find these and ordered a pair. My boyfriend and I love them so much for playing board games on our new coffee table or on the floor. It provides extra seating for guests to sit around our coffee table in addition to our couch. Great color and very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: It's starting to bend already.
customer_reviews.text: It worked well for about two weeks. After that, it's already started bending. It no longer sits upright, even in the most upright angle it slants now after sitting in it as my main chair. I wouldn't recommend it..you get what you pay for i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Fawkes

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a complete piece of junk, it broke shortly after my purchase!!! The back support is wayyyyyy too short, the materials are poorly chosen! Really needs to be stronger metal supports
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small living room: packable and attractive coffee-table-height seats with back support
customer_reviews.text: These seats are light yet sturdy, and can hold up throughout game nights or working on your laptop. Easy to store away under couches, and perfect for small living rooms when friends come over. Whoever designed this thought about the needs of someone who'd be buying this: likely someone who wants extra seats when friends are over, but the option to easily store the chairs when not in use. The adjustable back support adds more value and usability as a reading, working, or simply relaxing seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a mild form of scoliosis and used a Push Back Recliner inherited from my mom to watch entertainment and do computing with. It was clearly not good for my back, particularly because I'd also try to eat dinner will sitting in it. This chair is perfect when accompanied with a low table, in my case the AZUMAYA Folding Coffee Center Table TAC-229. Very happy. I will be denoting the Lazy Boy to a charity as I'm sure there are many good ole boys would enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Flynn Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good support, and sufficient reclining positions
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Pleased with the recline method (laying completely flat to reset) and somewhat satisfied with the reclining options. Highly reviewing the reclining measurements before purchase. I bought ergonomic cushions because there is no curve to the back. Since the chair is fairly short, using the cushion is not recommended. I am using a folded baby blanket or hand towel for support and it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kymberly

customer_reviews.title: Great floor chair
customer_reviews.text: Since my husband has been working from home during COVID - I needed my own space so I installed a Murphy bed and turned my guest room into a yoga / art studio. I wanted to be able to sit on the floor and work on my computer. This floor chair is perfect. It's not too big and it's comfortable. It can lay flat to get out of the way. I can use is for meditation and it looks really nice. I love it
customer_reviews.author: yoga judy

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Has 5 or so positions between 0 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Has 5 or so positions between 0 and 90 degrees, which is plenty. The only issue is a static shock is created when you grip it tightly enough to engage the outside fabric with the internal skeleton frame. Not a big shock but jarring enough! Recommend buying if you have a permanent place for it. We don't, so we store it (which is easy enough to do as it's slim), but it won't get the use it could if we left it out permanently (we were placing it on the sofa). Imagine it'd work well for a living or play room with enough space for it.
customer_reviews.author: eviewatts

customer_reviews.title: Love this...but
customer_reviews.text: I do love this seat and my son loves it too. Bought this for my son. I love the quality the colors and the material, and so does he. It's just one click away from making him sit right upright. I don't know if mine is broken or that's how it is but it does not let him sit right up, just a little back more than he would want. I guess a cushion would help. Love it though!
customer_reviews.author: Audley

customer_reviews.title: Nah....keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice & elegant and that's it. The kids (10 & 7) and myself find it to be very uncomfortable. I can't imagine sitting on it for a long period of time. It attractes every dog hair, dust particle and anything else making it a pain to clean. We donated it snd bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: Casa De Oro

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: this chair is incredibly comfortable and works really well to provide stability while I am sitting on my bed. I even discovered that if I flip it over, I can elevate my knees with it - also perfect! If I buy another one, I may get the one that is about 3" wider. I am small and my width is about the same as the chair so it remains very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Frenzy

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what my back needed!!!❤❤❤
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with my purchase!! I got this chair so I can use it while meditating for back support. I also bought it to use inside my tent in my office. Yes I have a tent popped up in my office and this chair has made hanging inside of my tent so much more fun and comfortable. I can set it to either straight to lay down, to sit up straight or so I can lounge back. It is very supportive. Not only do I like my new chair so does my cat lol. He was checking it out in the picture lol. A great buy and I'm glad I chose this style. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: monique young

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair - A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after using a similar one at a yoga retreat. I was surprised when I received it that it was very narrow, which is fine because I'm not that big. The one I used at the retreat was wider and had more cushion on the bottom part of the seat. If I were to do it again, I would have purchased the larger model but I do like this seat a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia Haag

customer_reviews.title: nice for floor sitting, but...
customer_reviews.text: Its nice for floor sitting but without extra padding on the seat, I find it hard to sit for extended periods of time. I am usually sitting on carpeted floors so there is a little bit more cushion. Seems well constructed and have not had any problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Takenaka

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: I used it during a mass yoga/meditation program. It worked great and provided back support for a heavy guy like me. However, it was not easy to carry it from one place to another. It is clumsy to carry, would not stay straight and there is no handle to hold it by. Would be great if there is like a side handle which keep it straight and also helps in carrying. Otherwise, not a bad purchase. I saw a few of these at the venue as well. More color options and some way to put your name tag would be good as well. Overall, worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Kedar

customer_reviews.title: Sinks in pretty quick
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend games quite a bit on the floor and wanted to get her some good/comfortable support to be on the floor for hours at a time. She notices it sink right in right away and could feel the frame almost immediately. Not bad for short sessions, but if you want to sit for longer than 30 minutes I'd go elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Dan Conner

customer_reviews.title: Good for Kotatsu sitting.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to have some back support when I sat at my Kotatsu. It’s definitely an improvement over leaning against the sofa. There’s enough angles I can read comfortably however I feel that day, or watch TV. There’s enough padding to be comfy. My only gripe is that you can only move the seat upright. If you want to move it backwards, you need to pull the back all the way forward, and start flat again. I might get a couple more of these if I get more company coming over. They seem to be on the less expensive side, but they’re comfortable regardless.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: It was great! Until it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this chair for a few months now, and frankly didn’t use it much. In the last couple weeks, I’ve started using it a couple times a week for meditations & reading. This morning, I went to sit on it and heard a loud snap. Something broke inside it and now it doesn’t work as well. Hopefully we can get a replacement organized so I can get back to enjoying it! Otherwise this chair has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Watson

customer_reviews.title: Adjustability and looks
customer_reviews.text: Just received the product today so it’s too early to give the full feedback. But what I have seen from packaging to the product, it looks a durable and a decent product. Adjustment is pretty easy and seems holding the weight of the back. Hopefully, it will stand it’s look and comfort for long
customer_reviews.author: Naveed A. Khan

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't ask for a better chair on the ground!! If you want to lean further back you can adjust it by laying it flat first and then choose the notch (by slowly moving it up) where you want it to stay for your comfort. It is absolutely perfect, so I ordered TWO of them for extra company upstairs when viewing a movie on TV!!! You will NOT be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Niki A.

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em, Love 'em, Love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I got online to order a pair of backjacks but just as I was checking out noticed that these guys were cheaper, adjustable, more stylish and came with better reviews. They arrived today and I'm delighted! So comfortable, enabling multiple sitting positions and no assembly required. My only potential qualm is how long the adjustable mechanism will hold out given how often we'll be sitting on them. Love 'em!!
customer_reviews.author: JMc

customer_reviews.title: Great support! Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are wonderful. We have been using these since we got them. We sit close to the TV for video games and these provide great back support and they have different back positions. They are so comfortable that I have fallen asleep on them many times! I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Meditate in COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: I used this meditation chair at a retreat last weekend and ordered one for myself before the retreat was over! It is a solid, well built floor chair that has made my meditation experience more comfortable! The box came with a hole punched in it but the chair inside was wrapped in a protective covering that kept the chair clean even with the hole in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tw

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous little chair. I use it to meditate my son uses it for gaming. Lovely colors, very sturdy, great fabric and very comfy and soft
customer_reviews.author: araya310

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair for sitting on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I like how this chair has several modes and is very comfortable to sit on for long periods. I think it has great back support and if flatten at 180 degrees, is comfortable to lie on. Cleaning seems simple enough. The cover is also removable, but I haven't try taking that out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kavi Tan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Floor Chair.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great floor chair. I bought it for my husband because we own a store and he likes to sit on the floor with our puppies while we are there. It's really comfortable and is preventing him from getting back pain. It's light and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy Love

customer_reviews.title: very apt for meditation
customer_reviews.text: for people with back issues who prefer to have a backrest while meditating....this is by far the most perfect option. with meditation while its ok to use a backrest, u dont want one that makes you slump or too comfortable. u need to stay alert. this chair does just that. fabric is comfortable enough that it doesnt need a cushion unlike the easy comfort. chair is small enough that it doesnt need too much space unlike the vivo iii. i wouldnt change anything in this. finally enjoying the two hours daily meditation
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice meditation chair!
customer_reviews.text: I saw these chairs at a 10 day meditation retreat. The individuals who were using them stated they were very comfortable and showed me how easy the chairs were to adjust. They are also easily stored and easy to set up right out of the box. Nice padding as well. You can add an extra cushion on the seat as needed
customer_reviews.author: crusherlarue

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for anyone over about 150 lbs
customer_reviews.text: Metal frame snapped in half. Wouldn’t recommend for anyone over about 150 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Tooby

customer_reviews.title: works great for meditation on the floor or outside
customer_reviews.text: I used this to meditate in the woods yesterday, it really works well. Easy to pull into the perfect support position. Has very nice suede or suede-like outer fabric. Its quite attractive and very comfortable. I like that I can get both legs, crossed, completely onto the bottom cushion, and I'm a big guy, six feet, 230lbs. Its lightweight and easy to carry in one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I was Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: I recently had spinal surgery on my neck and am forced to wear a collar around my neck for the next few weeks. This was making it impossible to lay back on my couch with my feet up and watch TV, because I couldn't turn my head to see the screen. What I needed was some kind of adjustable back support, so I could control how much I was leaning back. I never heard of a floor chair, but it proved to be the perfect solution to my dilemma. Been using it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered securely & in a timely manner. Surprisingly comfortable & helpful - for me. I have to work on the floor for a project. I have a chronic back pain, which gets worsened.This ‘chair’ is lightweight, stable & supportive for me. It was delivered securely & in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter to use with her new Japanese homework table/nightstand. I purchased a couple options for her to choose from and this was the winner. We ordered a second one and she is very happy with it. I have no doubt these would act as extra seating at Christmas when opening gifts or playing games when company comes. I see they are high quality and the free tea spoon was a nice thought as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Priebe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair, but I wish it would fold in half for storage instead of just straight.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Floor Chair
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to open as I I had to get my room together. Well, I finally did and I am really pleased with this chair. It is exactly what I was looking for, especially for the price. It is really the perfect floor chair for meditation and prayer.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It does what it supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a little extra seating when people come over. I don't mind sitting on the floor, but I wanted a little bit of comfort. This did the job so far. I'm about 6' and around 190 lbs., and I sat in it to just chill and chat, play video games, and watch TV. The back portion is comfortable, but I do wish the seat had a little more cushion. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ZombiesvSharks

customer_reviews.title: Smart looking simple. Good price point.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. The only improvement I would recommend is the padding could be a little more dense. I will be sitting in this for long stretches during yoga teacher training. I already feel my bum hit the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Really helps my back and my lower back region specifically. I find myself sitting up more and it's easy to carry, comfortable, and easy to clean. Highly recommend it! Comfort: 10/10 Easy to carry: 10/10 Easy to store:10/10 Helps body: 9/10
customer_reviews.author: Merlin M.

customer_reviews.title: It's strong and sturdy it's great product.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE!!!! This chair,it works exactly for what I got it for. I like watching tv in bed but I don't like to be laying down in bed for hours so I put it in my bed and it's perfect!!! and can watch tv for hours comfortably without slouching. Thanks so much your product is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for meditation.
customer_reviews.text: When on retreat, I can spend 4 - 6 hours on my meditation seat. This chair has really helped my back during these times.
customer_reviews.author: S. Langone

customer_reviews.title: Broke in first few uses
customer_reviews.text: I work at an early childhood center, and I purchased two of these chairs for the teachers in the baby room. Unfortunately, one of these chairs broke within the first two weeks. The teachers informed me last week that they are no longer using the second chair because if the babies push on the chair, the chair can unfold and fall on the child. I wanted to return and exchange for a sturdier built chair that was better designed for our needs, but apparently we just missed the return window. [I'd direct this feedback directly to the seller, but I can't do so privately without providing a review of some kind.]
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your back will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this chair so much, we bought a second one the next day. We are moving in a few months and do not want to get a new couch until then so, our backs have been killing us from our old ikea couch. We use this on our couch, to sit up in bed, or to sit on the floor for game night!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette Rodriguez-Moody

customer_reviews.title: Great discovery, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: How did I not know these things existed before?? This is so awesome, now I can comfortably sit in front of my warm cozy fire...and I love how classy it looks, just like the picture. Only reason it’s not 5 stars is it does have a bit of a factory smell to it that was quite strong when I pulled it out of the bag, but to be fair, it’s quickly dissipating by the next day. Overall I highly recommend if you’re one of those people that like sitting on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 2 SIT ON BED WITH LAPTOP!
customer_reviews.text: This product received 4 out of 5 stars due to the chemical smell that took 48hrs to dissipate. Besides that I LOVE THIS PURCHASE! It's great to use in bed while working on my laptop. I've also used it on my leather sofa. Great support and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Bodie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & supportive!
customer_reviews.text: Just started a meditation studio and wasn’t sure about these floor chairs based on the reviews, but I ordered 16 anyways. So glad I did. It’s quite comfortable and supportive. Gave it a 4 for sturdiness because I kinda flipped but I wasn’t paying attention. If used intention, should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. It is sturdy and comfortable when I sit on it to have tea with my friend. I like the color and the softness of the chairs. The only concern is that it’s difficult for cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Plush and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We love this chair. It’s so great for me or my husband to sit with the kids on the ground and they love to steal it to. Had one as a kid and this is an upgrade!
customer_reviews.author: Sportzchck

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. It could use a little more cushion on the seat. I think it is nice for floor sitters. I brought it for my disabled son. It does help him sit straight when on the floor. It seems sturdy because it holds him up. He has difficulty in the recline position.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Great for back support!
customer_reviews.text: Floor chair really helps with my back support! I usually sit in the floor when organizing items or folding laundry, so this item has really come in handy!! Mechanic is like a lawn chair to adjust the angle for comfort. I would like it to be slightly more cushioned on the seat itself. Currently, it’s been less than 3 months of use and it’s a bit deflated. Other than that pretty good product!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: but really not so comfortable. I wouldn't waste you money
customer_reviews.text: Practical, but really not so comfortable. I wouldn't waste you money. Spend a bit more and buy something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fold all the way
customer_reviews.text: It’s just regular floor chair, I bought it due to the photos showing it being folded in half so figured it would fold in half for easy storage. Well it doesn’t fold in half, pretty upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: thomas kang

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and comfortable seat, very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this as soon as I took it out of the box! It looks pretty and has great back support with a comfortable seat. And it can be used almost anywhere as it is very portable. I highly recommend this product. Good job bonVIVO!
customer_reviews.author: F.K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfy but I think I bought the wrong one
customer_reviews.text: Material and adjustable seating extremely comfy but the one I bought doesn't fold all the way in order to be portable. I saw after that there is a portable version of this so I may have to return and buy that one. I will leave comments on that when I make the exchange! Also, when I went to a ceremony, there were 3 other people with the same chair. It was hilarious and I joked about that with them about most likely buying this at amazon as well!
customer_reviews.author: Adina

customer_reviews.title: Still using it today.
customer_reviews.text: Sometime you get tired sitting on a chair and may want to sit on the floor. Having a laptop table on my laps sitting cross legged feels comfortable. Very sturdy and easy to put away not using it. Great to have when leaning back but still not falling over.
customer_reviews.author: Oioxxoio

customer_reviews.title: Great for daycare teachers
customer_reviews.text: I’m a early childhood educator and spend a lot of time on the floor (especially at nap time) I’ve been suffering from back problems and was looking for something to easy the pressure during floor time when I came across this product. It is wonderful. The back is adjustable. The padding is pretty good. The fabric is soft. I would have liked if it ahad a lumbar support but other than that 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Cutie pies

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: It was fine until it broke less than a month after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Smallwood

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize it had multiple settings for the position the back was. It is super comfy and I can sit/lay there for hours. Great deal for the price and easy to store in its full vertical position. Nice to clean. It was hard to find a good instructional video - to locate the positions, pull the back as close as you can to the seat, then lay it down flat. Then you will find the natural grooves where the positions click. There are four settings.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my daughter-in-law . They have two young kids and spend a good amount of time on the floor playing and reading. This is a back saver!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Hutton

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Sufficient padding for my weight, pretty comfy. Light and easy to move around yet doesn't slide too easily on floor. Fold/lock mechanism feels sturdy, at least for now. Cons: Intense static electricity and unpleasant 'new' odor when unwrapping from plastic. Neither of these are a long-term thing, just something to be aware of. Chair back is slightly shorter than I was hoping for, but it still supports up to my shoulder blades which is good enough. Most of the negative reviews I read were issues with durability. I will try to remember to update this review if mine breaks too soon.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmic Elucidator

customer_reviews.title: It's comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a meditation retreat. Exactly what I was expecting. It's comfortable to sit on, and the support in the back is nice. My only complaint is I wish it had an angle that sat straight up...you can get close to sitting straight up though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This actually has lumbar support. I was not expecting that. I use this when car camping in my Mazda CX-5. It allows me to sit upright when my back seats are folded down for sleeping. When I am done I just flatten it out and stow it away under the sleeping platform I built in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer B.

customer_reviews.title: great for meditation
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this extensively but it seems well made and it pretty much cured my back pain the first time I used it for meditating.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

product_meta.title: bonVIVO Easy II Padded Floor Chair, Semi-Foldable Folding Chair for Floor Seating, Meditation, Bleachers and Outdoor Chair, Blue & Beige
feature_bullets: ✔ FOLDABLE WITH CONVENIENT TECHNOLOGY AND MATERIALS: The backrest offers an adjustable feature that gives you the support to achieve a comfortable posture. The floor seating for adults has a combination of upholstery filling, PE foam and PU foam conforms ideally to the body and offers maximum comfort for sitting and reclining. It supports a body weight of up to 220lb.

✔ UNIVERSAL APPLICATIONS: Whether as a lounge, meditation cushion cover, floor gaming chairs for adults and teens, or discussion groups in the office, thid fold out chair functions as a floor lounger and seat cushion and is not only eye-catching, but also fits perfectly into any room and will relieve your back pain with it's continuos back support.

✔ COMFORT AND STYLE BY BONVIVO: We understand the importance and impact of your comfort and well-being during your daily activities, whether indoors and outdoors, BonVIVO has designed this Foldable Chair to help you relax in any situation and enjoy hassle and beautiful comfy and entertaining moments.

✔ EASY TRANSPORT AND ADAPTABILITY: The memory foam chairs for teens is easy to transport because of its low weight of only 6 lbs. And if you just want to create some space, its small footprint makes it easy to store. Cleaning the cover is easy, too: The cover is made of high quality stain-resistant synthetic fiber and is easily wiped clean with a damp sponge. It also adapts to any chair like gaming chair, reading chair and also stadium chair.
✔ DESIGN: Available in your choice of three color combinations to match any decor: dark blue and cognac, red and ivory, or cognac and beige W17” x H21” x D19”;. Weight 6 lbs.
